quote: My grandmother was the very first female broker in the Quad Cities area back in 1954.
why_clipworthy: Highlights a pioneering story that adds depth and credibility to Brad's real estate journey.
suggested_hook: Discover the inspiring legacy behind a top real estate producer.

quote: You can't control what you can't control, like interest rates and inventory.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to focus on controllable aspects of their business.
suggested_hook: How to thrive in real estate despite market challenges.
